Privacy.title: Privacy Policy
Privacy.intro: This Privacy Policy explains how PhotoSpots collects, uses, and protects personal data ‚Äî including when you join the waitlist or use our mobile application.

who.title: Who is the controller?
who.body: The data controller is PhotoSpots (personal project by Pawe≈Ç Pamu≈Ça). For any privacy questions, email pawelpamula003@gmail.com.

what.title: What data we collect
what.email: Email address ‚Äî when you join the waitlist to receive updates.
what.account: Account data (app) ‚Äî email, username, profile/avatar if you create an account.
what.content: User content ‚Äî spots you add (location, description, photos). Content may be public in the app.
what.location: Approximate location ‚Äî only if you choose to include it when creating a spot.
what.tech: Technical data ‚Äî basic usage analytics via PostHog and standard server logs for security.

why.title: Why we process your data
why.provide: Provide the service (waitlist, account, saving and displaying spots).

why.improve: Improve the product and user experience (aggregated analytics).

processors.note: We do not sell your personal data. Processors act on our behalf under data processing agreements.

retention.title: Data retention
retention.body: We keep personal data only as long as needed to provide the service or until you request deletion. Waitlist emails are kept until you unsubscribe or request removal. Account data and user content can be deleted when you delete your account (subject to backup/archival timelines).

rights.delete: Delete your data (‚Äúright to be forgotten‚Äù).

rights.contact: To exercise your rights, email pawelpamula003@gmail.com.

transfers.title: International transfers
transfers.body: Some providers may store data outside your country. Where applicable, we rely on appropriate safeguards (e.g., standard contractual clauses).

security.title: Security
security.body: We use reasonable technical and organizational measures to protect your data. No system is 100% secure, but we work to minimize risk (e.g., access controls, least privilege, encrypted transport).

children.title: Children
children.body: PhotoSpots is not directed to children under 16. If you believe a child provided us data, contact us to remove it.

changes.title: Changes to this policy
changes.body: We may update this policy from time to time. We will post changes here and update the date above.
